feed.title: <center> Whole-brain B<sub>1</sub>-mapping using three-dimensional DREAM </center>
feed.subtitle: Demonstration of a 3D version of the DREAM sequence (3DREAM) for rapid 3D flip angles and B1 mapping of the human brain.

author.name: Philipp Ehses, Daniel Brenner, Rudiger Strinberg, Eberhard D.Pracht, Tony Stocker
